::FireBlade::

FireBlade smiles as the missiles fall to the ground....And an even
larger grin comes over him as Prowl flies towards him. He deflects
three of the laser blasts with his Blade but on knicks his other arm.
He growls and fires 10 more PowerSurge shots from his rifle at the
incoming Prowl still continuing to run for the base.

He was now within 100 m of it.

--- In nbwrpg@y..., Yanshosh@a... wrote:
> ::Prowl::
>
> Prowl doesn't reply to Fireblade, concentrating on watching out for
more shots to dodge. If Fireblade had EMP weapons, a close encounted
would be suicidal.
>
> The grenades disable the missiles, sending them falling harmlessly
to the ground. Prowl growls, firing four laser blasts down at
Fireblade and flying toward him. The bot's insult had pissed Prowl
off, but he was still careful, ready to angle up in case of more EMP
grenades.
>
>
>
> --- In nbwrpg@y..., gunthers8@n... wrote:
> > ::FireBlade::
> > "Bah you and you infernal flying and shooting missiles....come fight
> > like a warrior you panzy mechaninic" FireBlade yells at Prowl.
> >
> > He continues running this time as he fires three more EMP grenades in
> > arc hoping to screw up the homing sensors of the missiles....
